sentences.en: And how much further does Arsene Wenger need to go to merit the opprobrium and Chelsea?
sentences.cn: 看看温格有多么需要从责骂中获利,他们超越了切尔西好多了.

sentences.en: Consequently , more opprobrium followed after a couple of good openings went west in Israel.
sentences.cn: 在以色列的比赛中错过了几个好机会后, 更多的责难砸向了他.

sentences.en: His political opinions have attracted the opprobrium of the Left.
sentences.cn: 他的政治观点遭到左派的抨击。

sentences.en: In English, these are all terms of mild opprobrium when directed at the flatterer.
sentences.cn: 在英语中,当人们形容那些善于拍马屁的人时, 这些都是温和的贬义词.

sentences.en: Public opprobrium, though, seems a small price to pay for the calamities visited on everyone else.
sentences.cn: 不过, 在把其他所有人都卷入灾难之后,自己仅仅是受到公众的指责, 这个代价委实不算大.

sentences.en: That drunkard was the opprobrium of our community.
sentences.cn: 那个酒鬼是我们社区里可耻的人物.

sentences.en: The name [ was ] a by - word of scorn and opprobrium throughout the cityWashington Irving.
sentences.cn: 这个名字成了全城表示轻蔑和耻辱的代名词(华盛顿·欧文).

sentences.en: The name was a by - word of scorn and opprobrium throughout the city.
sentences.cn: 这个名字成了全城表示轻蔑和耻辱的代名词.

sentences.en: The opprobrium and enmity he incurred were caused by his outspoken brashness.
sentences.cn: 他招致的轻蔑和敌意是由于他出言过于粗率而造成的.

sentences.en: These are all terms of mild opprobrium when directed at the flatterer.
sentences.cn: 当人们形容那些善于拍马屁的人时,这些都是温和的贬义词.
